test.name: Unsuccessful Login by Locked Out User

kw.name: Open Browser

kw.arg: Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc:
A test suite for different login conditions
This suite tests for the following scenarios - Successful user login - Unsuccessful user login by locked out user - Incorrect Password - Logged in as a problem user with a broken inventory page

suite.doc:
A test suite for different sorting criterion
This suite tests for the following scenarios - Sorted name from A to Z - Sorted name from Z to A - Sorted by lowest to highest price - Logged by highest to lowest price
